{\n\n\ndataframe <- dataframe |>\n    janitor::clean_names() |>\n    \n    mutate(across(c(num_lanes, num_reported_accidents, speed_limit), ~ as.factor(.x), .names = \"factor_{.col}\")) |> \n  \n    mutate(across(c(where(is.character)), ~ as.factor(.x))) \n\nreturn(dataframe)\n}\n\nraw_df <- read_csv(str_c(path, \"train.csv\"),\n                   show_col_types = FALSE) \n\ntst_df <- read_csv(str_c(path, \"test.csv\"),\n                   show_col_types = FALSE)  \n\n\n# the synthetic playground competitions seem to perform better when numerics are also included as factors\nall_df <-\n    bind_rows(raw_df %>% mutate(source = \"train\"),\n              tst_df %>% mutate(source = \"test\")) |>\n          preprocessor() \n\ntrain_df <- all_df %>% \n  filter(source == \"train\") %>% \n  select(-source) \n\ncompetition_df <- all_df %>% \n  filter(source == \"test\") %>% \n  select(-source, -accident_risk)\n\n\n```\n# EDA {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}\n\n## names()\n```\n\nNominal features:\n\n`r nom_features`\n\nNumeric features: \n\n`r num_features`\n\nLogical features: \n\n`r logical_features`\n\n\nSize of the combined train and competition    competition_df %>% mutate(source = \"test\")) |> \n    group_by_at(features) %>%\n    mutate(num_dups = n(),\n           dup_id = row_number()) %>% \n    ungroup() %>% \n    group_by(source) %>%\n    mutate(is_duplicated = dup_id > 1) %>% \n    count(is_duplicated) %>% \n                   knitr::kable()\n\n\n\n```\n\n\n## Pairwise Correlations\n                   \n`ggcorrplot` provides a quick plot_correlation_funnel()\n\n```\n\n                   \n## Target\n\nThe outcome variable distribution is skewed with values between 0 and 1.\n\n```{r}\n#| label: outcome \n#| warning: false\n#| ggplot(aes(accident_risk)) +\n  geom_histogram(bins = 100) +\n  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +\n  labs(title = \"accident_risk\",\n       caption = \"Data: Kaggle.com | Visual: Jim false\n#| fig.width: 6\n                   \ncatboost_rec <- recipe(formula(paste0(\"accident_risk ~ \", str_c(features, collapse = \" + \"))), data = train_df) |> \n  step_interact( ~ curvature:speed_limit)\n\nfolds <- vfold_cv(train_df,\n                  v = 8,\n                  repeats = 1,\n                  strata = accident_risk)\n\n                   \n```\n\n\n## Catboost Workflowsets\n\n\n```{r}\n#| label: catboost workflowsets\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\n\n\nboost_tree_catboost_spec <- \n  boost_tree(\n    trees = 425,\n     learn_rate =  tune()\n  ) %>% \n  set_engine(engine = \"catboost\" ,\n             thread_count = cores) %>%\n  set_mode(mode = \"regression\") \n\ndep_models <-\n   workflow_set(\n      preproc = list(base = catboost_rec),\n      models = list(catboost = boost_tree_catboost_spec),\n      cross = FALSE\n   ) %>%\n  option_add_parameters() |>\n  option_add(\n    control = finetune::control_sim_anneal( save_pred = TRUE, save_workflow = TRUE, verbose = TRUE),\n    metrics = metric_set(rmse)\n  )\n\ncatboost_params <- dep_models |>\n extract_workflow(\"base_catboost\") |>\n extract_parameter_set_dials() |>\n update(\n         learn_rate = learn_rate(range = c(-1.2,-0.7))\n )\n\ncatboost_models <- dep_models |>\n option_add(\n   param_info = catboost_params,\n   id = \"base_catboost\"\n ) |>\n  workflow_map(\"tune_sim_anneal\", resamples = folds, iter = 9,\n               metrics = metric_set(rmse), verbose = TRUE)\n                   \n\nautoplot(catboost_models) +\n  geom_text(aes(y = mean -0.002, label = wflow_id), angle = 90, hjust = 1)+\n  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,NA), expand = c(0, 0)) |>\n  theme(legend.position = \"none\")\n\nrank_results(catboost_models, rank_metric = \"rmse\", select_best = TRUE) %>%\n   select(rank, mean, model, wflow_id, .config)\n \ncatboost_models %>%\n  dplyr::filter(grepl(\"catboost\", wflow_id)) %>%\n  mutate(metrics = map(result, collect_metrics)) %>%\n  dplyr::select(wflow_id, metrics) %>%\n  tidyr::unnest(cols = metrics) |>\n  arrange(mean)\n\ncatboost_models |>\n  workflowsets::extract_workflow_set_result(\"base_catboost\") |>\n  autoplot() +\n  labs(title = \"Catboost Hyperparameter Search\")\n\nbest_params <- catboost_models |>\n  workflowsets::extract_workflow_set_result(\"base_catboost\") |>\n  tune::select_best(metric = \"rmse\")\n\nregression_fit <- workflow(catboost_rec, boost_tree_catboost_spec) |>\n  finalize_workflow(best_params) |>\n  fit(train_df)\n\n```\n\n\n\n# Performance {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}\n\n## DALEX\n\n```{r}\n#| label: explainer\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\n#| fig.height: 12\n\nexplainer <- \n  explain_tidymodels(\n    regression_fit, \n    data = train_df %>% dplyr::select(all_of(features)), \n    y = as.numeric(train_df$accident_risk),\n    label = \"Ensemble\",\n    verbose = FALSE\n  )  %>% \n  model_parts()\n\nggplot_imp <- function(...) {\n  obj <- list(...)\n  metric_name <- attr(obj[[1]], \"loss_name\")\n  metric_lab <- paste(metric_name, \n                      \"after permutations\\n(lower indicates more important)\")\n  \n  full_vip <- bind_rows(obj) %>%\n    filter(variable != \"_baseline_\")\n  \n  perm_vals <- full_vip %>% \n    filter(variable == \"_full_model_\") %>% \n    group_by(label) %>% \n    summarise(dropout_loss = mean(dropout_loss))\n  \n  p <- full_vip %>%\n    filter(variable != \"_full_model_\") %>% \n    mutate(variable = fct_reorder(variable, -dropout_loss)) %>%\n    ggplot(aes(dropout_loss, variable)) \n  \n  if(length(obj) > 1) {\n    p <- p + \n      facet_wrap(vars(label)) +\n      geom_vline(data = perm_vals, aes(xintercept = dropout_loss, color = label),\n                 linewidth = 1.4, lty = 2, alpha = 0.7) +\n      geom_boxplot(aes(color = label, fill = label), alpha = 0.2)\n  } else {\n    p <- p + \n      geom_vline(data = perm_vals, aes(xintercept = dropout_loss),\n                 linewidth = 1.4, lty = 2, alpha = 0.7) +\n      geom_boxplot(fill = \"#91CBD765\", alpha = 0.4)\n    \n  }\n  p +\n    theme(legend.position = \"none\") +\n    labs(x = metric_lab, \n         y = NULL,  fill = NULL,  color = NULL)\n}\n                   \nggplot_imp(explainer)      \n                   \n\n```                      \n\n\n
